name: Cozy Cafe
description:
How to Play:
  • To go to the next line of a dialogue, press [Spacebar]
  • To brew drinks, drag and drop ingredients (images on the right-hand side) by clicking and holding on them with [Left Mouse Button], and then dragging to one of the three slots in the middle.
    • You can brew drinks with any number of ingredients, however, all of the recipes require 3 ingredients
    • Ingredients must be in the correct order per the recipe found on the clipboard in order to successfully brew a drink
  • Once you have dragged ingredients into the middle slots, you can brew a recipe by clicking with [Left Mouse Button] on the green "Brew" button located on the coffee machine.
  • To check recipes, click with [Left Mouse Button] on the clipboard (left-hand side)
    • You can go to different recipes by clicking with [Left Mouse Button] on the arrow(s) at the bottom of each recipe page.
    • To exit the recipes, click with [Left Mouse Button] on the "X" button in the top right corner of the recipe page.
    • After a drink is successfully brewed, the recipe will update with that drink's name
  • After the day is complete, you can restart it by clicking with [Left Mouse Button] on the "Restart Day" button that appears on the "Opening Day Complete" screen
